elements.2211.03035_2d360ec49d0a413c9cea4c56ca5b8: F. Kamalov, H. Sulieman, A. Cherukuri]
elements.2211.03035_83dc9f08f6ba3503ab6a454fff2b5: Feature selection is an important and active field of research in machine learning and data science
elements.2211.03035_94cbb10f8f5602f38221867d442e7: Our goal in this paper is to propose a collection of synthetic datasets that can be used as a common reference point for feature selection algorithms
elements.2211.03035_3b665cb8499181234efa298144c99: Synthetic datasets allow for precise evaluation of selected features and control of the data parameters for comprehensive assessment
elements.2211.03035_267aadb8344509159c9dcb6f8dfdd: The proposed datasets are based on applications from electronics in order to mimic real life scenarios
elements.2211.03035_184c9a59a85568e4e441c3a3b054e: To illustrate the utility of the proposed data we employ one of the datasets to test several popular feature selection algorithms
elements.2211.03035_f5648fe30efe2a77b2306ec8e3d10: The datasets are made publicly available on GitHub and can be used by researchers to evaluate feature selection algorithms.
elements.2211.03035_4f12b15b4c7c9c424349172ce4cd3: Feature selection is a well investigated subject with a large amount of literature devoted to its study
elements.2211.03035_c3e7e8206572abc2c0463d3f8f9f4: In an effort to improve on the existing results, researchers are continuously introducing new feature selection methods
elements.2211.03035_d4b7f1fb96b30a2ff69ec04f17112: The existence of such a large corpus of feature selection methods creates a challenge to compare and contrast different methods
elements.2211.03035_3aac1952ab856f7a4cbce701b8395: Part of the challenge lies in the lack of agreement among researchers regarding benchmark datasets to be used for evaluating feature selection algorithms
elements.2211.03035_6e1dad430f9c22f129a974dcc51e7: Each team of researchers uses its own judgment and preference to decide on the data to be used for evaluating their proposed method
elements.2211.03035_e791db0d06088eb5989a813842281: Given that feature selection methods are often tested on different datasets, it is hard to compare and analyze the reported results
elements.2211.03035_994a0ba65a7c36ce9b17362dc26c0: In this paper, we attempt to standardize the evaluation process by introducing a collection of synthetic datasets that are designed specifically for the purpose of feature selection
elements.2211.03035_7b9c28bf86cd32dfc89556aa2fc72: Synthetic data offers several advantages over real-life data
elements.2211.03035_2ddd6a257179708cc30482604cfbb: Unlike real-life data, the relevant features of synthetic data are known a priori
elements.2211.03035_aaecdc02a1b64e5d7fc6c4dbb3fb6: Thus, it is possible to directly evaluate a feature selection method with the exact knowledge of the correct features
elements.2211.03035_d1c8c41de62620e9586991f23fff0: In addition, synthetic data allows us to control the parameters of data and analyze the performance of feature selection methods under various conditions
elements.2211.03035_c43998889115659607fdc0a9e4666: By varying the number of irrelevant and correlated features we can investigate the precision of feature selection methods
elements.2211.03035_d3689be87ca5ba6543a9c46e681fe: Synthetic data also allows us to control the amount of random noise and study the corresponding effectiveness of the selection algorithms
elements.2211.03035_29f16ad0f3940732b93c7e969d662: Finally, by controlling the degrees of freedom of the target value function, we can measure the response of selection algorithms to nonlinear problems
elements.2211.03035_1dee89cf893d0f4b4d18c0b01f99f: The proposed synthetic datasets are inspired by ideas from electrical engineering
elements.2211.03035_37f849ea5b7c937c88ef4c78dd31b: In particular, we employ digital logic, electric circuits, and light-emitting diodes to design the synthetic datasets
elements.2211.03035_f4d563bfd64e255aa463ba5ac8b44: Digital logic is applied in electronics and computer architecture as well as in robotics and other fields
elements.2211.03035_b441d6ff495c5c6ee8b9aa1bcab45: Therefore, using digital logic allows us to construct realistic datasets for feature selection
elements.2211.03035_a16b6e650b519b654afd8207c366e: Logic operations allow the construction of both linear and nonlinear target variables
elements.2211.03035_dc19e8ee155c4a802a0733ecf5bda: In addition, redundant and correlated variables as well as noise can easily be implemented within synthetic data using digital logic
elements.2211.03035_7daa1ed4c28ace4db9ca88e6daea9: Similarly, electric circuits play a fundamental role in electrical engineering
elements.2211.03035_4676bcba094331eb95103ae757006: Given the analog nature of electric circuits, we can generate continuous-valued data to simulate regression tasks
elements.2211.03035_fc9cd5ca6651e301176ff6d301ab9: While synthetic datasets have been used for feature selection in the past, their adoption as standard benchmark datasets has been limited
elements.2211.03035_4da182a914a5db556577eb3942289: This is partly due to the lack of datasets that are specifically designed for feature selection and not just general machine learning tasks
elements.2211.03035_c927e7a300af39b83b1242c4fc49e: In addition, there does not exist a simple way for accessing these datasets
elements.2211.03035_9eb43d9c2cf8652591c54d3548032: To overcome, these drawbacks the proposed synthetic data is purpose-built for feature selection
elements.2211.03035_c2d4a4736df84b35fa91d1746606d: Furthermore, for convenience, the code for generating the proposed data is shared on GitHub
elements.2211.03035_b8b7e16ab1a507d43e584ca6da4ba: Thus, we hope to bring the evaluation process into a common framework to advance the research on feature selection algorithms
elements.2211.03035_5a8a1871b508cf7192f1feb72c77b: Our paper is structured as follows
elements.2211.03035_7d2a35754ec16e3e91fe198a788bb: In Section 2, we provide a brief overview of the existing literature
elements.2211.03035_3d8d877b3ff334cddf27fbac1d44a: In Section 3, we describe the details of the proposed synthetic datasets
elements.2211.03035_15139882b2030ce26d484ac9c18ea: In Section 4, we use one of the proposed datasets to evaluate the performance of feature selection methods
elements.2211.03035_85c64dfa3a5ed43090dfcc14574e5: Most of the existing synthetic data used in feature selection was originally designed for general machine learning tasks such as classification and regression
elements.2211.03035_6fc1e04f3257cc4f69b18f3aa70e7: In particular, synthetic datasets based on Boolean features and operations have been utilized in the past, albeit in a limited capacity
elements.2211.03035_38b6dca33ec62684528fe56aef977: The most well-known Boolean dataset is the XOR data which consists of two relevant features together with several irrelevant features
elements.2211.03035_0a775e4c816008d33a2cbbafcd0f3: The target variable is determined by the formula
elements.2211.03035_0ccf997dd19ca4f48fef097995406: Another commonly used Boolean data is based on the parity function
elements.2211.03035_a2cb96d818a92812514bf8509603a: relevant features and the target variable is given by the rule
elements.2211.03035_972195463c021c170756c94dfbe42: , the authors proposed the CorrAL dataset which consists of six Boolean features and the target variable is given by the formula
elements.2211.03035_634bd87076992f7c093c1d6d64377: An extension of the CorrAL dataset with 100 features was proposed in
elements.2211.03035_13241a8ed2567550dd3dafcb37e69: , the authors use six binary features to describe the task of a robot which is used as a basis for a synthetic dataset
elements.2211.03035_6a322461cfef9ab5542f31e7cceb7: , the authors mimicked microarray data to create synthetic data with similar characteristics
elements.2211.03035_f6aa8adcb9faf84826a3ef9243392: A synthetic dataset with continuous features and a binary target variable was proposed in
elements.2211.03035_faedfccc81fe7c4212f5a8a64679d: , where the authors divided 100 features into 10 groups of highly correlated variables
elements.2211.03035_25eaf9f2f1f0ab7f2d8bb88da8aec: Then the points where randomly assigned into two clusters using the Gaussian distribution
elements.2211.03035_8d0c66aaa9e9d45b12b278d3777d7: Another dataset with continuous features and a binary class value was given in
elements.2211.03035_a9acdd193d8796ef3f57068454838: , where the target variable was decided as a linear function of equal weights of the relevant features
elements.2211.03035_73a23be13aa1bee5ed602e6e4f42a: , the authors used a similar approach but using a nonlinear neural network to generate the class labels
elements.2211.03035_84981fbd3d7f2bc6a947b823e99e8: Synthetic data has also been employed in nontraditional feature selection tasks such as unsupervised feature selection
elements.2211.03035_5a0e34a0f20c3901b2ae449ed5494: We note that not all synthetic data is well suited for feature selection
elements.2211.03035_77c29c1447182ce6c0fb9476137d9: Perhaps the most well-known continuous-valued synthetic data are the Friedman datasets
elements.2211.03035_0cc0acd3bf7716b7e1c2219f2eca1: The datasets consists of several relevant and irrelevant continuous-valued features
elements.2211.03035_4af6c2f89c5f3960e40e9602a1f74: The target value is computed based on polynomial, rational, and trigonometric operations
elements.2211.03035_fc58885ef28a5f41dcfc957480f72: The Friedman datasets were originally designed for testing regression models
elements.2211.03035_cf6c02f50be73318a6285fd742b39: Researchers have subsequently also used it in feature selection.
elements.2211.03035_49018d9c9472d1a7df2c6540347d8: In this section, we describe the proposed synthetic data for feature selection
elements.2211.03035_595c4c4a46dd53fbbaf25635f6b16: The datasets are presented in order from simple to complex
elements.2211.03035_8b90e45f54f692fdffd6484891f2d: The summary of the proposed datasets is provided in Table
elements.2211.03035_4697f01d8fe4323e3bcdc2763a3be: Every dataset consists of a total of 100 features and a target variable
elements.2211.03035_91402d90967cdb4a5e0ca87c60213: The target value is completely determined by the relevant features
elements.2211.03035_9b457da0585a5f23054ca6d89a93f: In our approach, we chose to include the same number of redundant features as the relevant ones
elements.2211.03035_73b93f2f5f6b8714bc268e6294e9c: The redundant features are created either as a negation of the corresponding relevant feature in the case of binary features or as a linear function of the corresponding relevant feature in the case of continuous features
elements.2211.03035_addf7e68f32e16bbdb4dcd6555bb1: In addition, each dataset includes 2 correlated features
elements.2211.03035_9db956ec4fad0ccc03e95eb05371d: The correlated features are created by randomly changing the value of the target variable in 30
elements.2211.03035_3b3bb511be16b7e1fb77ab76d890c: Thus, the correlated features are correlated with the target variable 70
elements.2211.03035_4a5f42dacabd76cb7cf8b5361f8f6: Note that the correlated features have no causal relation with the target variable and are not desirable
elements.2211.03035_becfbbab36302fbbbd2c75967c9d4: The remaining features are randomly generated to be irrelevant
elements.2211.03035_f4266505ebab3c544e80223d83501: The proposed datasets cover a range of possibilities for the target variable including binary, multi-class, and continuous values
elements.2211.03035_33c89539203037faaa0ebd423b1ae: The number of observations is chosen to be small relative to the number of features
elements.2211.03035_6c49de182b1a9bb1d73b8ebf4fbaf: However, it can be adjusted as necessary
elements.2211.03035_5c89e548cdfb1a024f75d082c32a3: The details of each proposed dataset are presented in the subsequent sections.
elements.2211.03035_867f06c3a28639aafc6c15786d08e: The irrelevant variables are created using a random number generator
elements.2211.03035_471f230c159432ebd336fbaeef92d: To maintain consistency a fixed random seed is used in generating the irrelevant variables
elements.2211.03035_ca4175b55989c44b712feb4b8efd1: All the datasets were created using Python programming language
elements.2211.03035_9ef6b2201f2f87a75a3460dd99cc6: The datasets and the corresponding code are publicly available on
elements.2211.03035_fc34ff6081eba7e414d5828ab020a: The proposed dataset is based on a two-layer circuit as shown in Figure
elements.2211.03035_8b210b9f455d8cc2ec2ad51216870: The first layer consists of an OR gate, while the second layer consists of an AND gate.
elements.2211.03035_86b2f6d4ee837be3a7594873c099a: The ORAND dataset contains three relevant features
elements.2211.03035_980f530de716987ac8e1dd64784c6: is calculated via the following formula:
elements.2211.03035_799ccfebb4fea2e4f62c53fe74c83: In addition to the three relevant variables, we add three redundant (correlated) variables - one for each of
elements.2211.03035_2031b214d28f29452804cdbf322ee: We also add 2 features that randomly match the target variable in 70
elements.2211.03035_b92a6e2403c08c0f648ae6e3e77bf: irrelevant features which are randomly generated according to the Bernoulli process
elements.2211.03035_a349bce141806063443d1805ecd12: We obtain a synthetic dataset consisting of 3 relevant, 3 redundant, 2 correlated, and 92 irrelevant features
elements.2211.03035_06ac5e561293ab3f50136e6b6eb4f: possible feature value combinations of which we select
elements.2211.03035_8ed70737fcd2ad5df07171407566c: As it is often the case with high dimensional data, the number of features is high relative to the number of observations
elements.2211.03035_2164a9de2307a73642fbf4e88bf96: While the default number of samples is 50, it can be changed as necessary
elements.2211.03035_9d277f55a2926effac905592d081d: In fact, both the number of observations and the number of irrelevant features can be varied to analyze the performance of a feature selection algorithm under different conditions
elements.2211.03035_d49adc79582cf5434e53d36be8956: However, it is strongly advised to employ the proposed datasets under the default settings, at least once, to obtain a benchmark reference result.
elements.2211.03035_66248ed242e9fab345de2e1b2f915: The first layer consists of two AND gates, while the second layer consists of a single OR gate.
elements.2211.03035_7e0dd2c16d22cdd4a365ec4202454: The ANDOR dataset contains four relevant features
elements.2211.03035_15fccd3b0eb95abf4b78428880770: can be viewed as the sum of products

elements.2211.03035_b52f4c41206b79ce3bcf64aec99b0: We use the features to randomly generate
elements.2211.03035_13f8b0c55d992fd3e6ea25877f2e0: We obtain a synthetic dataset consisting of 4 relevant, 4 redundant, 2 correlated, and 90 irrelevant features and 50 samples
elements.2211.03035_af363b04b42ed833d74a7fa37ad67: As with the ORAND dataset, the number of irrelevant features
elements.2211.03035_09d81fb85097667624450e9cc0e3c: can be changed to evaluate a feature selection algorithm under different scenarios
elements.2211.03035_d4c6f261b2b1b57a2e04abe6ddcab: The ANDOR dataset can be expanded by increasing the number of relevant variables up to
elements.2211.03035_62d8b143719e82d1bdcda4cbf090a: Additional redundant and irrelevant features can be included in similar fashion as above.
elements.2211.03035_4be79c97b920dd408e62898066c74: The ADDER dataset is based on the eponymous adder circuit
elements.2211.03035_e4b5abeae171decaa45e99d8e7658: It is a multi-class target dataset
elements.2211.03035_0afbc7c11b82c350898e24d19401e: The full adder takes three inputs
elements.2211.03035_8e2392165c639d62a585511a26bf4: The outputs are calculated according to the following formulae:
elements.2211.03035_5d945dc8d3d5fcb16ce06a8234fc0: As usual, we add redundant features - one for each of

elements.2211.03035_be0076fba4fb778a9ae9753b44f12: The final dataset consists of 3 relevant, 3 redundant, 2 correlated, and 92 irrelevant features and 50 observations
elements.2211.03035_efbc57c3b27aa1a33e3232e7cbd59: As mentioned above, unlike ORAND and ANDOR, ADDER is a multi-class dataset with a 4-class target variable.
elements.2211.03035_56f5cc04f1276fa4e30b4995be9c9: The LED-16 dataset is based on the 16-segment display configuration shown in Figure
elements.2211.03035_4990488168900af2a96e8ad0dd1b6: The 16-segment configuration allows to display all 26 letters of the English alphabet as well as all the digits 0-9
elements.2211.03035_d31cb662ead8e1519c73b18c82da3: Each segment represents a binary feature: on/off
elements.2211.03035_dbb8d3fc48b781ae8d70f4a6ecde8: The target variable is the alpha-numeric value displayed by the segments
elements.2211.03035_fd44de6ac85e3d89bd4033fd76dde: Thus, the target variable can take 36 different values
elements.2211.03035_5fef155d380f3a5ab27fce3803e70: We add 16 redundant features - one for each relevant feature (segment)
elements.2211.03035_f8db7f50dd725e16c2995ba440a93: We also include 2 correlated and 66 irrelevant features with randomly generated binary values.
elements.2211.03035_0b5164d40502ad0816c08d69d4cf5: The dataset contains 180 observations - 5 samples for each target value
elements.2211.03035_358dc700bfc5f213143f2a038d5f1: In particular, for each target value, the values of the relevant and redundant features are determined by the display configuration, while the values of remaining features are randomly generated
elements.2211.03035_e775c02c5217e3166e00ac852a26d: In summary, the LED-16 dataset consists of 16 relevant, 16 redundant, 2 correlated, and 66 irrelevant features and 180 observations
elements.2211.03035_08c5163b48b357b1d06cdc7af2e93: It is a multi-class dataset with a 36-class target variable
elements.2211.03035_cd9c9ba4864cff30d91cde42cc376: , some LED segments are used more frequently than others
elements.2211.03035_619d070c45a3758828bceaf40f1ee: For example, the segment F is utilized in the majority of configurations, while the segment H is used in only a few times
elements.2211.03035_2d9adba456450c59ccaea0c88ec0d: While both segments are relevant, they have different levels of significance
elements.2211.03035_5eca066786056470e778299710a4a: The LED-16 dataset allows to evaluate feature selection algorithms on the basis of their sensitivity to different level of feature relevance
elements.2211.03035_b02911e99d9578c828327f8e022e1: A robust selection algorithm should identify both strongly and weakly relevant features.
elements.2211.03035_a6241d6467fd8c60e88d6a771fe1b: The proposed dataset is based on the parallel resistor circuit
elements.2211.03035_ec516e11c5b491264256ddbe638f5: that are connected in parallel, the total resistance
elements.2211.03035_b3f4a862b5f960a579daa1ff214eb: is given by the following equation:
elements.2211.03035_ee9b8d2c5974bb2fc8dca2cbc0d54: For the proposed PRC dataset, we use 5 parallel connected resistors (relevant features)
elements.2211.03035_fd18a0b0012946693f32742b966cc: are generated according to the Gaussian distribution with mean
elements.2211.03035_0e96b2e743ad75ab54453538f01a1: Since the parallel resistors as well as the total resistance are continuous valued variables, the PRC dataset implies a regression task
elements.2211.03035_0299045ae7b79217ac7420cebe87b: We generate 5 redundant, 2 correlated, and 88 irrelevant features to include in the dataset
elements.2211.03035_aedcfbb7049a6b4cbf0ef72524bf1: The redundant variables are created as linear transformations of the relevant variables
elements.2211.03035_6d142cfae58ad381c7203da0d5c3f: The correlated variables are created by adding a small amount of noise perturbation to the target variable
elements.2211.03035_19a8e8a28f68c16efc898ebeaf652: Half of the irrelevant variables are generated according to the same Gaussian distribution as the relevant variables
elements.2211.03035_eff5fbe71834913b80a1312986bc8: , we generated nine random features according to the Gaussian distribution
elements.2211.03035_6682d0e87fedae73a7ef9719c3cf1: The remaining half of the irrelevant features are randomly generated according to the uniform distribution
elements.2211.03035_0d856f996623804acfdf2bb52fa29: is continuous valued, we generate more observations for the PCR dataset than for the classification data described in the previous sections
elements.2211.03035_bf2ca13ce15cfffc876475f8bb806: In particular, we generate 500 samples using the full feature set, where the target variable is calculated via Equation
elements.2211.03035_1cebaa44e663b1dac55f1184e5fbf: A comparator circuit compares two inputs - usually voltages or currents - and outputs either 1 or 0 depending on which input is greater
elements.2211.03035_4c99874350db92f5d2419733f86a5: It is often used to check if a single input is above a certain threshold
elements.2211.03035_b639552069d6d21171ed9459bc673: In this manner, a comparator can employed to convert an analog (continuous) signal into a digital (binary) output
elements.2211.03035_47039a607cba615959fb49c290022: Since a comparator converts a continuous signal into binary, it can be employed in conjunction with the digital circuits described in previous sections including ORAND, ANDOR, and ADDER
elements.2211.03035_72df9ff78f98ca2876e525bc0d9b2: For instance, one or more input variables in the ORAND circuit can be continuous-valued by using a comparator as a preprocessing gate
elements.2211.03035_08460edf51a5ef2e6882fa5df878a: Thus, datasets with binary features can be extended to include continuous features, which increases the number of available synthetic datasets for feature selection.
elements.2211.03035_d127e05e24a08856a33296630e3ce: Feature selection based on synthetic data
elements.2211.03035_7a5ddc02d16f02d6bb32c98b6dcee: To illustrate the application of the proposed synthetic data we evaluate the performance of standard feature selection algorithms on the ANDOR dataset
elements.2211.03035_5c622c31f28255c55712a9e1fd1e3: Since the relevant features in synthetic data are known, we can directly analyze the effectiveness of the algorithms
elements.2211.03035_c772749e81cafec891fe6c71a91fc: Synthetic data also gives an option to control the number of samples and the level of noise in the data which enables researchers better understand the performance of the algorithms under different scenarios.
elements.2211.03035_1a26c7a483c915b2a9d100790f314: We use the ANDOR dataset described in Section
elements.2211.03035_c5072fedd5c400ae65900ae54649a: to evaluate the feature selection algorithms
elements.2211.03035_f20a8ff5dbd90fddd503a265d1d97: The dataset consists of 4 relevant, 4 redundant, 2 correlated, and 90 irrelevant features and a binary target class
elements.2211.03035_5bef170658fb84d30c5c841dbe9a6: The redundant variables are the negations of the relevant variables
elements.2211.03035_b0a46645e25b57af2e6510ef8ac70: The correlated variables are correlated with the target variable at 70
elements.2211.03035_a2d6dcf5499825e8982e8222be124: To observe the effect of the sample size we consider the datasets with 50 and 20 samples
elements.2211.03035_b0cc7d90bea43c6ea781236f25fe5: To account for random variations, we generate the ANDOR dataset using 10 different random seeds
elements.2211.03035_0357d401ae55117aa9b722f143dbc: The feature selection algorithms are applied to each of the 10 datasets
elements.2211.03035_54632dc5663fb067f8143b8fb094e: The results are averaged and presented for analysis.
elements.2211.03035_1e1eb7b6c0148c156bc2c24030638: We consider univariate algorithms, recursive feature elimination (RFE), and model-based algorithms for feature selection
elements.2211.03035_57ddf15db862185a755c0e6b9ea7d: In the univariate approach, we employ
elements.2211.03035_89d90ce404a2dc1cb9b2f2604175e: to measure the relationship between a feature and the target variable
elements.2211.03035_e4546fbd6bd4a2e385aee4795f3cf: In the RFE approach, we use the support vector classifier (SVC) with linear kernel
elements.2211.03035_6bc769a791d3f92a6501f7d76d859: The SVC model is iteratively fit to the data and at each stage the variable with the lowest coefficient is discarded
elements.2211.03035_b260e033c8efffe53ac7f3f712afd: In the model-based approach, we use SVC with the
elements.2211.03035_9921c8f429942983ea5fc0b526122: The lasso model automatically discards the irrelevant features as part of the fitting process
elements.2211.03035_3157df40a44ee4610519d1e921f8b: The extra-trees classifier is used to calculate the reduction in impurity of each feature during the fitting process.
elements.2211.03035_59124634ae24e911a5ebf3b885abc: ), RFE, lasso, and extreme trees - are tested based on the ANDOR dataset
elements.2211.03035_ce4cad3d13668646f16b133c97dc3: The results show that the feature selection methods perform relatively well in distinguishing between the relevant and the irrelevant features
elements.2211.03035_108933e3e87f61b162b27e1d3ce03: However, the selection algorithms struggle to separate the relevant features from the redundant and correlated features
elements.2211.03035_04fdcc149425ba353775f7883505d: Furthermore, a decrease in the sample size leads to a lower distinction between the relevant and irrelevant features
elements.2211.03035_082c77593cbf4d4f1307b34a4157e: The results of the univariate approach for feature selection are presented in Figure
elements.2211.03035_f0e8bba7bdbc681814fc2ecbe23a3: -scores between the features and the target variable over 10 runs are provided
elements.2211.03035_4285b164776a66117537e6dfc3f48: Since the correlated and irrelevant features are randomly generated, there exists variation in the results between the runs
elements.2211.03035_1d8f7fb44690f3e0b5dcc274806a0: To show the variations between the runs the standard deviation of
elements.2211.03035_b7395fb2c99a90b8011e2cb7f1f5e: -scores are represented by the red line segments
elements.2211.03035_54d61eba996ad171c6835a0e1e743: , in case when the sample size is
elements.2211.03035_244c2da21d556bfae19addee79cdf: -scores to the relevant features than the irrelevant features
elements.2211.03035_318cbf1fc51d7c145c5b288f17a0d: On the other hand, it also assigns high scores to the redundant and correlated features
elements.2211.03035_1abec084e2cb5faef386f44299930: Thus, while the algorithm is able to distinguish the relevant features from the irrelevant features, it fails to distinguish the relevant features from the redundant and correlated features
elements.2211.03035_498c730ff6d2d710ee0e5d55914c4: , the difference in scores between the relevant and irrelevant features is considerably lower than in the case
elements.2211.03035_cef86d4fb61918a65865ddebbd7e8: Given the large variation of the irrelevant features, it is highly likely that at least some of the irrelevant features may obtain a higher
elements.2211.03035_32659df2cce67ccb88ab54da37c97: are particularly susceptible to being overlooked.
elements.2211.03035_b710ea22c1960867e7d5fda6ab17e: The results of the RFE approach are presented in Table
elements.2211.03035_131910ee08722bb863053524a9e72: The tables present RFE feature rankings for the relevant (
elements.2211.03035_3b35e7792fef14930dd04fffcd8ea: The left and right tables correspond to the data of size
elements.2211.03035_c078cc1592e86c004d005d17044ff: The rows in the tables correspond to the datasets generated using different random seeds
elements.2211.03035_d4cf00c50a0c1572f5dbec62f11bc: provides the median rankings of the features across 10 runs
elements.2211.03035_56d65f367188469dea146f58d45a5: The results show that the RFE approach is less effective than the univariate approach
elements.2211.03035_68f3f7741820d472439407da2dcae: There is a significant variation in the rankings between different versions of the dataset which suggests that RFE is not a stable method
elements.2211.03035_3288a165eb292c71ff0ca8b86260c: To summarize the results we consider the median rankings
elements.2211.03035_b138627dca73b40f874f46f05aab6: , 6 features achieved median ranking in the top 10, but only one feature
elements.2211.03035_0d726d1865074d92cf46bb40ed36c: Thus, if we were to select the top 4 features - since that is the number of relevant variables - only one feature would be correctly selected
elements.2211.03035_1b03b279700b1075b5b9591d913a5: , the algorithm performs poorly with only one feature in top 10 and none in the top 4
elements.2211.03035_49b9892865c79c38e23536e1f30d1: It is unsurprising that the algorithm is less effective when using a small sample size.

elements.2211.03035_ff5bad3000d2ef9696a37d742f4b3: The results of the lasso-based approach in case the
elements.2211.03035_916ccd9e83b59bed9f9c1a8bef3e6: -axis represents the number of times a feature was selected in the lasso model
elements.2211.03035_4f09946d01a94d94bcfb5c005b657: As shown in the figure, the lasso approach performed well in this case
elements.2211.03035_89e835b5d8add14d7fc644cbe301a: The relevant features achieve significantly higher scores than the irrelevant features
elements.2211.03035_8780132866e04104924c00f99a317: However, the redundant and correlated features also achieve high scores
elements.2211.03035_55aeaab7c969979c4db8e0af3a725: Thus, while the lasso approach is effective at distinguishing between the relevant and irrelevant features, it fails to differentiate the relevant features from the redundant and correlated features
elements.2211.03035_8b825dab7fe0499b87b5dac030f52: , the scores for the relevant features are significantly lower than those for the correlated features
elements.2211.03035_86237f2994af0e30e803a4d4dc57d: In addition, several irrelevant features have higher scores than the relevant features
elements.2211.03035_97287c41ff592f260b355334731c1: On the other hand, three of the redundant features have high scores which can be an acceptable substitute for the relevant features.
elements.2211.03035_251dd334f8708f75ed526f2021536: The results of the approach based on extra-trees are presented in Figure
elements.2211.03035_57d2e5978364c5d9f2585ce0d2636: -axis indicates the average decrease in impurity corresponding to a feature
elements.2211.03035_7743493b221eae06939081423e14c: , the algorithm performs better than the previous approaches by assigning higher level of importance to relevant features than the irrelevant and correlated features
elements.2211.03035_8a1fbf2fcd6fd3202e46f2ea51eda: We also note that the irrelevant features have low variance
elements.2211.03035_0bc9f2e1bf8366487c394f49d2e44: So they are less likely to be selected by chance
elements.2211.03035_8c6e9dd7d0674588fc253d35acf93: However, the algorithm does not distinguish well between the relevant and redundant variables
elements.2211.03035_9511cb838917c2488bfba792a97ff: As expected, the algorithm performs worse in the case
elements.2211.03035_b180e8c5426fb265fc8ea0702e4c4: While the importance of the relevant variables
elements.2211.03035_ebc4501dfdf8ae1511093dc1bf433: remains significantly above the irrelevant variables, the gap between the relevant variables
elements.2211.03035_802b50e31471e7507844c020ffba0: and the rest of the features decreased considerably
elements.2211.03035_ac8291b4ca60286551f5bce43c8e9: In addition, the variance of the irrelevant variables increased which increases the likelihood of an irrelevant variable achieving a high level importance purely by chance.
elements.2211.03035_b05c25b38939430d76dcf844482b7: Our aim in this paper was to promote common benchmarking of feature selection algorithms
elements.2211.03035_61daeddcda1a73a7008810cca78a2: To this end, we proposed a set of synthetic data that can be used as a universal reference point
elements.2211.03035_2d255d64262e50a602ade537ab1bf: The proposed synthetic datasets are motivated by ideas from electrical engineering
elements.2211.03035_8832a797aaa275d14beaf07a773b8: By mimicking real-life scenarios our goal was to produce data that can provide sensible evaluation of feature selection algorithms
elements.2211.03035_0d8f9243cfac055358879a2b3dd36: Synthetic data has several advantages including the knowledge of the relevant features and the ability to vary the parameters of the data
elements.2211.03035_e75fcfe96217db6503b6f871c84c0: As a result, synthetic data allows for a comprehensive evaluation of feature selection algorithms
elements.2211.03035_cf45b464278d02e1ee8a789a4d2aa: To promote the adoption of common benchmarking, the proposed datasets are made publicly available on
elements.2211.03035_e59bdc146715e1f33640e2fa3afcb: We encourage researchers to test their algorithms on these datasets
elements.2211.03035_405739247ecb2b5b311cda437f000: For convenience, we provide the code for generating the data which can be used to modify the parameters of the data as needed
elements.2211.03035_98c46cd36bd71976720b8794e7a3e: However, we strongly advise to use the data under the default settings at least once
elements.2211.03035_d96cf81800c251ab111273ce521ef: In the future, more synthetic datasets inspired by different sources can be added to the proposed collection
elements.2211.03035_9f565e8ed2fb05000b3d9d050de83: In particular, synthetic data mimicking the gene data in medical research would be desirable
elements.2211.03035_b0c07eb0745b5a71c7cd274b4c245: Data for regression tasks with continuous features would also enrich the existing collection.
